scripts.start:development: env-cmd -f .env env-cmd -f .env.development env-cmd -f .env.local npm run -s dev
scripts.build: env-cmd -f .env preact build --no-prerender --no-sw --template src/template.html && npm run build-api
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync build s3://bedtime.audius.co --delete && aws s3 cp s3://bedtime.audius.co/index.html s3://bedtime.audius.co/index.html  --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/html --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E33HWSH5ZFFGR1 --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy:stage: aws s3 sync build s3://bedtime.staging.audius.co --delete && aws s3 cp s3://bedtime.staging.audius.co/index.html s3://bedtime.staging.audius.co/index.html  --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/html --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2FVSCZAVXZNSY --paths "/*"
